column1: Uchi////Thank you for taking the time to leave us this feedback. I am very sorry for the table you got sat in. I deeply apologize for that
column2: this is no way to enjoy dinner. Our guest typically enjoy our course pace
column3: our menu is large so at this pace you can enjoy most if not all the menu. However I see that this style is not for you
column4: I totally understand. My name is Jesse Regalado
column5: I am a manager here at Uchi. I would like to leave you my number (832) 797-2199. Please let me make your next reservation so I can tailor a meal for you. I can make sure the pace is slowed down and you have a warm table to sit at! I will also make a few course recommendations that I am sure will be amazing for y'all.
